mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_person_info (name, profile_img, gender, user_type, create_time, last_edit_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{profileImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender}, #{userType}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime})

INSERT INTO tb_user_identity (user_id, identity_type, identifier, credential, create_time, last_edit_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{identityType}, #{identifier}, #{credential}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, identity_type, identifier, credential, create_time, last_edit_time FROM tb_user_identity WHERE identifier = #{identifier}
SELECT COUNT(identifier) FROM tb_user_identity WHERE identifier = #{identifier}
